text: Saeed Karimian Saeed Karimian (8 August 1972 â€“ 29 April 2017) was an expatriate Iranian financier and owner of GEM TV who was assassinated in Istanbul, Turkey, on 29 April 2017, along with his Kuwaiti business partner. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Iranian businesspeople
title: Saeed Karimian
